1.1.1. v1 版本API视图

1.1.1.1. 定义开转融工具类

@File : base_class.py @Author : wst @Time : 2022/3/11 下午5:22 @Description : 定义各种工具类

class client.apis.v1.base_class.BaseApprovalView(business_name, company_id, work_flow_node)[源代码]

基类：object

审批列表基础类 使用方法（调用之前记得鉴权）： 1. 直接使用返回结果列表； 2. 如果返回结果字段不一样，继承此类并并重写函数get_queryset_done/get_queryset_undo

初始化参数列表 @param business_name: 业务名称，如：open(开立),transfer(转让),financing(融资) @param company_id: 企业id @param work_flow_node: 当前审批节点(工作流节点),如：open_examine(内部审批)

get_cc_done()[源代码]

获取已审批的x信id列表:

get_credit_certificateds_undo()[源代码]

初步获取x信id列表-待审批

get_credit_certificates_done()[源代码]

初步获取x信id列表-已审批

get_logs(cc_ids)[源代码]

根据x信id获取最新的驳回日志id

get_queryset_done()[源代码]

获取已审批数据集

get_queryset_undo()[源代码]

获取待审批数据集

class client.apis.v1.credit_financing.CreditCertificateFinancingParentAPIView(**kwargs)[源代码]

基类：rest_framework.viewsets.GenericViewSet

融资-授信凭证的基本信息:

  • get 获取父级凭证基本信息

  • post 新增融资凭证

post:

  • 新建融资信用凭证

  • 返回融资信用凭证的id

get_object()[源代码]

返回待融资信用凭证（父级凭证）

get_queryset()[源代码]

Get the list of items for this view. This must be an iterable, and may be a queryset. Defaults to using self.queryset.

This method should always be used rather than accessing self.queryset directly, as self.queryset gets evaluated only once, and those results are cached for all subsequent requests.

You may want to override this if you need to provide different querysets depending on the incoming request.

(Eg. return a list of items that is specific to the user)

get_queryset()[源代码]

Get the list of items for this view. This must be an iterable, and may be a queryset. Defaults to using self.queryset.

This method should always be used rather than accessing self.queryset directly, as self.queryset gets evaluated only once, and those results are cached for all subsequent requests.

You may want to override this if you need to provide different querysets depending on the incoming request.

(Eg. return a list of items that is specific to the user)
